travel_instructions.route_details: From Ahmedabad, take a flight from Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel International Airport (AMD) to a major Italian airport such as Rome–Fiumicino International Airport (FCO) or Milan Malpensa Airport (MXP), with possible layovers in cities like Dubai, Istanbul, or Frankfurt.
